name: Product Launch
description: End-to-end product launch from research through post-launch review

tasks.title: Market Research & Competitive Analysis
tasks.description: Analyze market landscape, identify competitors, and validate product-market fit

tasks.title: Product Requirements Document
tasks.description: Draft detailed PRD with user stories, acceptance criteria, and success metrics

tasks.title: UX Research & Wireframes
tasks.description: User interviews, journey mapping, and low-fidelity wireframes

tasks.title: Visual Design & Prototyping
tasks.description: High-fidelity mockups, design system components, and interactive prototype

tasks.title: Backend Architecture & API Design
tasks.description: Design system architecture, API contracts, and database schema

tasks.title: Sprint 1 - Core Features
tasks.description: Implement core backend services and frontend components

tasks.title: Sprint 2 - Integration & Polish
tasks.description: API integration, edge cases, error handling, and UI polish

tasks.title: QA Testing & Bug Fixes
tasks.description: Comprehensive test plan execution, regression testing, and bug remediation

tasks.title: Content & Documentation
tasks.description: Help docs, onboarding flows, marketing copy, and release notes

tasks.title: Launch Prep & Staging
tasks.description: Deploy to staging, final stakeholder review, go/no-go checklist

tasks.title: Go-Live & Monitoring
tasks.description: Production deployment, monitoring dashboards, and incident response readiness

tasks.title: Post-Launch Review
tasks.description: Analyze metrics, gather feedback, retrospective, and plan iterations

name: Website Redesign
description: Complete website overhaul from audit through launch and optimization

tasks.title: Site Audit & Analytics Review
tasks.description: Audit current site performance, UX issues, SEO gaps, and analytics data

tasks.title: Information Architecture & Wireframes
tasks.description: Restructure sitemap, navigation, and create wireframes for key pages

tasks.title: Visual Design System
tasks.description: Define typography, color palette, component library, and brand guidelines

tasks.title: Content Strategy & Copywriting
tasks.description: Develop content plan, write page copy, CTAs, and meta descriptions

tasks.title: Frontend Development
tasks.description: Build responsive pages, implement design system, and animations

tasks.title: CMS Integration & Backend
tasks.description: Set up CMS, integrate APIs, forms, and dynamic content

tasks.title: QA & Cross-Browser Testing
tasks.description: Test across devices, browsers, accessibility audit, and performance optimization

tasks.title: Content Migration
tasks.description: Migrate existing content, set up redirects, and verify SEO preservation

tasks.title: Staging Review & Launch
tasks.description: Final stakeholder review on staging, DNS cutover, and go-live

tasks.title: Post-Launch Monitoring & Optimization
tasks.description: Monitor analytics, fix launch issues, A/B tests, and performance tuning

name: Q1 Planning
description: Quarterly planning cycle from retrospective through team kickoff

tasks.title: Previous Quarter Retrospective
tasks.description: Review OKR outcomes, analyze wins/losses, and gather team feedback

tasks.title: Goal Setting & OKR Definition
tasks.description: Define quarterly objectives, key results, and success metrics

tasks.title: Budget Review & Allocation
tasks.description: Review budget constraints, allocate resources, and approve spend

tasks.title: Product Roadmap Creation
tasks.description: Prioritize features, create timeline, and align with business goals

tasks.title: Technical Roadmap & Debt Assessment
tasks.description: Inventory tech debt, plan infrastructure upgrades, and capacity planning

tasks.title: Resource Allocation & Hiring Plan
tasks.description: Map team capacity to roadmap, identify gaps, and draft hiring reqs

tasks.title: Design Sprint Planning
tasks.description: Plan design sprints, allocate design resources, and set up review cadence

tasks.title: Team Kickoff & Communication
tasks.description: All-hands presentation, team breakouts, and sprint zero planning
